rooms.description: An open space with floor-to-ceiling windows on the facade to allow ample natural light. The entrance hall features a Vastu-compliant layout with the main door positioned to align with the auspicious north-east direction.

Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural lighting. The room is arranged in a way that adheres to Vastu guidelines by ensuring the placement of furniture in the east and south directions.
Efficient kitchen layout with essential fixtures and an adjacent pantry. The design ensures a clear view from the entrance for better ventilation as per Vastu principles.
Small dining area adjacent to the living room, ensuring a continuous flow with the kitchen. The arrangement respects local building norms and Vastu guidelines.
A dedicated library space featuring ample shelving for books and comfortable seating. The room is designed with floor-to-ceiling windows to provide natural lighting while maintaining privacy.
Functional bathroom with Vastu-compliant positioning near the kitchen but not directly in line with the main entrance.

openings.details: Large glass front door for optimal natural light and adherence to Vastu principles.
Providing unobstructed views and natural lighting throughout the day.
A dedicated opening for access to the swimming pool area with safety features in compliance with local building codes.
